text:
By TheBlast Staff

The women of the E! series "Second Wives Club" won't be joining the Second Season Club because their show has been canceled.

According to our sources, the women on the show were surprised by the decision.

We're told the cast, made up of wealthy socialites like Lorenzo Lamas' ex-wife, believed the show was doing well and a second season was in the cards.

Sources close to the show tell us the producers aren't giving up on the show just because E! did — they are hopeful Bravo might snatch it up.

An E! rep couldn't be reached for comment.
title: 'Second Wives Club' Canceled After One Season
